about_the_game:
Welcome to a world where your people have thrived for millennia, having braved the tumultuous aftermath of a distant crash landing. This alien planet is your ancestral home, a testament to the resilience of your people. Amidst a dynamic and ever-evolving environment, the legacy of your ancestors beckons you to chart your own destiny.

A Sci-Fi Sandbox MMORPG Adventure

Embark on an unparalleled sci-fi sandbox MMORPG journey. Currently in closed beta on Windows, Ruin beckons explorers and adventurers to unearth its secrets. Join the thriving community, shaping the fate of this uncharted world. In Ruin, the universe is your canvas.

Forge Your Destiny: The Power of Guilds and Terraforming

Join forces with fellow adventurers to claim dominion over uncharted territories. Engage in strategic terraforming to fortify your holdings and harvest vital resources. Collaboration within guilds enables the transformation of barren landscapes into bastions of strength.

Dynamic Environments: Witness the Living World of Ruin

Experience the raw force of nature as the weather system dynamically shapes the terrain. From nurturing rains that sustain crops to fierce storms that can undo human progress, the environment of Ruin is in constant flux. Prepare to adapt and thrive amidst the ever-changing landscape, where the elements wield an unpredictable yet captivating influence.

Conquer the Depths: Unveil the Majesty of Dungeons and Raids

Assemble a formidable team of stalwart allies to conquer formidable bosses and conquer treacherous dungeons. Embrace the classic trinity roles of tank, healer, and DPS, or lead massive 40-player raids to claim glory and untold riches. Unravel the mysteries lurking in the shadows, for only the bold shall emerge victorious.

Seize Territories, Defend Realms: Engage in World PvP

Harness the power of strategic construction to fortify your territories against rival guilds. Erect impregnable defenses, restricting access to only trusted allies. Dominate the landscape and repel invaders as you vie for supremacy, using your cunning and might to reshape the political landscape of Ruin.

Unleash Your Potential: Customize Your Combat Style

Immerse yourself in a dynamic combat system, blending the nostalgia of old-school MMORPGs with modern flexibility. Tailor your arsenal of abilities and define your own combat style, unhindered by the constraints of traditional classes. Embrace the freedom to forge your legacy, one decisive blow at a time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: intel i5 6600 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: intel i5 8600 | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 | AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Ruin is a free to play survival sci-fi sandbox MMORPG indie game where you try to survive on mankinds attempt to colonize a distant planet. Chances are stacked against you, but don't give up. You are most likely the last human alive. It is up to you and you alone to do what you must to stay alive.
